document_data.name: Arton Githsberry
document_data.mainbody: '''Arton Githsberry''' was the ruler of [[Turmish]] in [[522 DR]], whose seat of power was the city of [[Alaghôn]].<ref name=TVR-p9 />
document_data.Activities: When petitioned by a joint delegation of [[Gulthmere Forest|Gulthmere]] [[druid]]s and [[Xorhun]]ian [[elf|elves]] to cease Turmish's logging operations, Githsberry made a show of inviting all his lords to discuss the issue. This gathering was merely a political facade, however, as Githberry had no intention of heeding the druids' request.<ref name=TVR-p9 />
